channel.title: Hover packet? 317
channel.description:
I'm making a server and don't know how to allow hovering to work e.g. when you hover over the logout button it goes yellow or red (dunno top of head) but for me it just stays one colour without any hovering affect or text.
I would of though this was a client sided issue but its handled by the server. Is there a packet to handle this or what? This goes for everything else that you can click or hover mouse over.

item.title: Hover packet? 317
item.dc:creator: @ixia ixia
item.description:
@ixia wrote:

I’m using the deob that you can download from mitb. It is not re-factored which makes me doubt its a client sided issue unless mitb or somebody else was messing around with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hover packet? 317
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Revamp dis Shit:

Clawz is right but it isn’t RSinterface for any older sources though :palm:

https://code.google.com/p/rename317/source/browse/trunk/src/rs2/RSInterface.java#153

Anyways the client has support for it by default for text only.

Read full topic
